name: Corona Roll
description:
Coronavirus has hit the world!

You need to Collect as much Toilet paper as possible!

Be careful though, the more you hoard ...the more dangerous it gets.

We haven't seen anyone get past 20 rolls...

EASTER EGG ALERT: See if you can identify any references to old games and some Animated TV Series.

FOR A GOOD CAUSE:

This game was made as a side project by  my brother and I. We  thought we could use it to help millions of people affected by the Coronavirus.

50% of donations will be issued to healthcare institutions ,with the remainder being used to help fund families in financial difficulties.
